* We discussed the upcoming GlobalJam which is on on 2nd-4th of March.
** <nowiki>[[JoelAddison|jaddi27]]</nowiki> to create jam-ideas wiki page.
* Ubuntu-AU'ers held an <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-au/1410/detail/|installfest]]</nowiki> in Brisbane at the Square Library. While it ended up being more of a social event, there was talk of holding more release parties and Ubuntu social events throughout the year.
